name: HYSEA EVENT Hyderabad 2025
description:
HYSEA Annual Summit & Awards 2025 – Hyderabad
The HYSEA Annual Summit & Awards 2025 is set to be the premier gathering of technology leaders, innovators, and policymakers in Hyderabad. This flagship event celebrates excellence in the IT and ITeS industry, featuring thought-provoking keynotes, panel discussions, and live showcases of cutting-edge innovations.

This year’s theme, “Empowering Innovation, Accelerating Growth,” highlights how emerging technologies like Generative AI, Quantum Computing, and Industry 4.0 are reshaping businesses and creating opportunities for India’s tech ecosystem.

name: Gen AI Carnival
description:
The GEN AI Carnival is an exclusive internal event designed to celebrate creativity, collaboration, and the transformative power of Generative AI across our organization.

This year’s edition brings together teams from every function to showcase real-world AI applications, breakthrough prototypes, and bold ideas that push the boundaries of what’s possible.
